title: Understanding Salt Types
text: To classify a salt as acidic, basic, or neutral, consider the nature of the ions that make up the salt. Think about the parent acid and base from which the salt is derived.

title: Identify the Parent Acid and Base
text: NH4+Cl- is formed from NH4OH (a weak base) and HCl (a strong acid). What does this tell you about the nature of the salt?

title: Determine the Salt Type
text: Since NH4+Cl- is derived from a weak base and a strong acid, it is classified as an acidic salt.
